item.description:
Why Goal-Setting Isn't Enough

As 2006 winds down, what can you do to set the stage for all you want to achieve in 2007? Join us as Sharon Teitelbaum, work-life and career coach, discusses the 5 biggest reasons people fail to reach their goals, and what YOU can do to avoid these pitfalls, starting immediately. This program will offer you strategies, tools, and re-frames to support you in creating more of the results you want.

Highlights include:
* Create physical and personal space for success
* Get very, very clear on your ACTUAL top priorities. Live and breathe them.
* Develop a detailed plan
* Strengthen your boundaries: beware of distractions and pests
* Protect your energy: eliminate energy drains
* Keep your batteries charged

Goal setting alone isn't enough. Find out how to actually accomplish your goals by joining us on December 7th. Remember, as a successful investor, it's important to Be in the Know!

Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: ForeclosuresMass' Turning the Key: Getting Clear For a Great Next Year
